title: (x) decorative soft serif - Cooper {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone identify please?

author: newbie_chez

comments.content:
[Cooper Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015092431/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/cooper_light_ot/&sample_text=I%20was%20thinking&sample_size=36) for the text.

Also available from [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015092431/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/bitstream_cooper_light_ot/&sample_text=I%20was%20thinking&sample_size=36).
